name: Hamster
description: Hamsters are small, nocturnal rodents known for their love of burrowing and hoarding food. They are popular pets due to their small size and relatively low maintenance.
fun_fact: Hamsters can stuff up to 20% of their body weight in their cheek pouches!

name: Rabbit
description: Rabbits are social and intelligent animals that require lots of care and attention. They are known for their gentle personalities and strong legs adapted for jumping.
fun_fact: Rabbits' teeth never stop growing; they have to chew constantly to keep them trimmed!

name: Guinea Pig
description: Guinea pigs are gentle, social rodents known for their adorable squeaks and strong bonds with their owners. They require daily vitamin C in their diets.
fun_fact: Guinea pigs are very vocal and have over 10 different sounds to communicate!

name: Parrot
description: Parrots are intelligent, colorful birds known for their ability to mimic human speech and their social nature. They need constant mental stimulation.
fun_fact: The African Grey Parrot is considered one of the most intelligent bird species!
